description:
WHEN THEY CONTROL THE NARRATIVE WE GET NOTHING BUT LIES

THEY DO NOT WANT YOU TO THINK FOR YOURSELF. 
Ask yourself this when have we ever been able to trust Rich people or companies to tell us the truth??? WITH SO MANY LIES BEING TOLD HOW DO WE KNOW WHAT TO BELIEVE?? #POPULATIONCONTROL 
#corona  #coronavirus  #Hr6666 #TraceAct #COVID19 #Shutdown #Martiallaw #quarantine  #pandemic #5G #Vaccination  #TRUSTNOTHING 
#QuestionEVERYTHING • #RESEARCHEVERYTHING •  Ignorance is no longer an excuse any one of us should use. Information is at your finger tips. The time you spend entertaining yourself. Take an hour of that learning something you don’t know. 
Ask the most important questions WHO WHAT WHERE WHY AND WHEN. 
No one gives you information for nothing. Most times especially with our government. If they tell you one thing look around they are hiding something else. We need to be more informed as a people. The days of trusting any one are done. See it for yourself,  Hear it for yourself, Touch it for yourself, and then after that do research just to make sure you know it’s true. We all have an agenda when we give information. SO DON’T BLINDLY FOLLOW ANY ONE • Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976, allowance is made for ""fair use"" for purposes such as criticism. commenting, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research. Fair use is a use permitted by copyright statute that might otherwise be infringing. • WE ARE THE #BLACKMEDIA SO WE MUST #CONTROLTHENARRATIVE becuase #ChangingTheNarrative IS OUR RESPONSIBILITY • Follow My PUBLIC PAGE @wecontrolthenarrative  #wecontrolthenarrative AND MY PRIVATE PAGE @Therealremyredd2 #Therealremyredd2 @Bothervex #BotherVex ✊🏾👊🏾 #therealremyredd
#happyblackhistorymonth #blackhistoryis365daysayear
